downloadTitle: Microsoft System Center 1801+ Management Pack for Service Management Automation
downloadDescription: Release of Microsoft System Center 1801+ Management Pack for Orchestrator - Service Management Automation

downloadFile.name: Microsoft System Center Management Pack for Service Management Automation.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/b/f/5/bf597257-151c-40fc-b569-a7efb4a58c76/Microsoft System Center Management Pack for Service Management Automation.msi

detailsSection:
The Microsoft System Center 1801+ Management Pack for Orchestrator - Service Management Automation monitors the health and availability of Microsoft System Center Orchestrator 1801 - Service Management Automation, and future releases, web services and runbook workers.

Feature Summary
  • Discovery of Worker servers, Web Services, and their relevant properties.
  • Monitoring and collection of counters indicating the performance of both Worker servers and Web Services. Includes alerting in case of performance degradation.
  • Monitoring and collection of message queue length indicating runbook jobs waiting to be run.
  • Collection of events indicating different runbook operations such as runbooks being created or started.
  • Collection of events indicating change in status of a job such as started, suspended, and failed.
  • Alerting in response to events indicating different runbook operations such as runbooks failing.
  • Proactive monitoring of the availability of each Web Service.
  • Proactive monitoring of the availability of the SMA database.

Release History
  • 8 February, 2018- Initial release, version 7.4.48.0
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft System Center Management Pack for Service Management Automation.msi
systemRequirementsSection:
• Other Requirements:
    • System Center 1801 Operations Manager and future releases
    • RAM – minimum 1GB recommended 2GB
    • Disk space minimum 200MB
    • CPU Dual Core or better
    • .Net 3.5
installInstructionSection:
Download the package and extract the three MP files to your computer by running the .exe.
    Microsoft.SystemCenter.1801+.ServiceManagementAutomation.mp
    Microsoft.SystemCenter.ServiceManagementAutomation.Dashboards.mp
    Microsoft.SystemCenter.ServiceManagementAutomation.Library.mp
Once you have reviewed the Monitoring Pack Guide and meet the prerequisites for the Monitoring Pack for System Center 1801+ Orchestrator - Service Management Automation you can import this management pack module using the Microsoft Operations Manager administrative console and following these steps. The MP file “Microsoft.SystemCenter.ServiceManagementAutomation.Library.mp” should be imported first.

  • Open the Microsoft Operations Manager Operator console
  • Click on the Administrator pane at the bottom left corner
  • Expand the Management Packs node in the tree view
  • Click on the Import Management Pack on the “Actions” pane on the right and then browse to the folder where you extracted the MP and then import it.
  • Follow the instructions until you have finished importing the management pack module.
